Blog.post: Gd murning everybody!!! i really can't sleep yesterday.... i donno why.... i'm still thiking abt my ex... i can't help it... i sometimez lay in bed at nite wondering wat he's doin.... haiz.... why must this happen to me??? Noori, if u happen to read this, i'm sorry.... i juz can't help it.... i know u're hurt.... we are gurlz... hati seorang pompan tu mmg lembut..... well........ i've got some problem with people in my skool... with da sec 4 boys..... ada dua budak sec 4 sound aku stead sey.... i dunno how to solve dis problem..... they r cute and handsome..... but i really hate their attitude.... like SHIT!!..... Serupa mcm setan!... The guy name is Irfan and the other one is Hariz... Yg si Hariz ni plak mcm GALA.... So tall.... I guess he's height is abt 1.8 someting..... haiz.... i can even break my neck man!!.... hahax.... they r not meant for me.... and i dun like them at all..... but i juz layan them... nanti org kate kite ni sombong plakz.... i treat them as my normal frend... not more than tat..... they r funny actually... sometimez i hang out with them at compasspoint..... bleh jadi kecoh sey pat sane..... both of them are from ORION (yellow house) and they r gd runners... well... i'm from AQUILA (green house ) ... different group ler..... Actually ORION is a gd team... they r the champion for every year.... aiyah..... AQUILA very bad lah.... got second everytime..... But this year, AQUILA got champion for the cheerleading.... tgk lah siapa joget kan.... aku jugak.... hahax..... i wish AQUILA will be the champion next year.... Wish only lah........ okayz.... i'm starving now... finding some food to eat.... den, do my hmwerk...... byez!!...... :>

Haiz........ i quarrel with Ershad juz now.... i really dun understand him.... why suddenly he mad at me???!!! he said tat i bustard him...... it's all crap lah... i asked him wat happened... but he juz kept quiet.... wat's wrong with him man.... at least tell me wat i've done wrong.... die ckp aku ngan noori same je..... tkde kene mengena sak.... kontol bodoh!! he said tat he regret to be my friend...... FINE!!! if he regret to be my friend, we can juz end our friendship here!! Haiz........... I've got so so so so many problems..... feel lyke killing myself.... sob..... sob...... :'(

Helo!! My name is Atikah.. I'm new here.... ok... let me introduce myself alrite..... I'm skooling at Compassvale Secondary..... I'm in secondary 2..... academic stream... Urm... Nothing much abt me.... I'm an easy going gurl.... Sometimez can be crazy and moody... If i'm moody, i won't talk to people for the whole day.... hahax.... rabak sak.... I think tat's all i can say abt me.... see ya! byezzzz!!!!...........
